title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.10 - Walls and ceilings-construction-item 2p
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.10 - Walls and ceilings-construction-item 2p

State Regulations
(a) Walls and ceilings are finished with
smooth, washable, light-colored painted wood, tile, smooth-surface concrete, cement plaster, brick or other equivalent materials with washable, light-colored surfaces. (b) Walls, partitions, windows, and ceilings are kept in good repair and refinished as
often as the finish wears off or becomes discolored. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
3.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
